snippet.title: Kotodama: The 7 Mysteries of Fujisawa - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/997060/Kotodama_The_7_Mysteries_of_Fujisawa/

Pre-Order on Switch (EU) today!
https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch/Kotodama-The-7-Mysteries-of-Fujisawa-1544876.html

Welcome to Fujisawa Academy – an educational institution where nothing is as it seems and every pupil hides a dark secret. Having made a pact with a demon fox - and bestowing you with the power to see the truth behind the lies, you must infiltrate the secretive Fujisawa Academy and uncover the sinister truths behind the seemingly normal façade.

Coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Steam in 2019

http://pqube.co.uk/kotodama/

Come chat to us on our PQube Discord server! 
https://discord.gg/xHS7MnU

#Kotodama
